questions.text: Who was rescued from Cadmus early in the episode?
questions.explanation:
Jeremiah.

	He had been trapped with Cadmus since before the season one pilot. He's been seen in flashbacks, and in one episode where they were inside Cadmus earlier this season. Jeremiah is played by Dean Cain.

questions.text: Who was left alone in Supergirl's bed early in the episode?
questions.explanation:
Mon-El.

	They had apparently spent the night together the night before, but it was only implied. Mon-El woke up and couldn't find her, he wondered allowed if "it" was that bad, or that good.

Winn.

	He asked Kara if she was going alone and she said she was taking "the other fly guy" with her, referring to Martian Manhunter. He responded with that line as she ran out of the room.

questions.text: What type of weapon did Cadmus build to help destroy National City?
questions.explanation:
Bomb.

	The bomb was made with energy harnessed from Supergirl's own heat vision. Jeremiah told them about it while they were all catching up.

Helen Slater.

	That is significant because Slater also player Supergirl in the big screen movie of the same name. She was cast as Jeremiah's wife as the adopted parents of Supergirl. Dean Cain, who played Jeremiah, also played Superman on "Lois and Clark: The New Adventures of Superman".

questions.text: Who was thrown out of the Danvers family party?
questions.explanation:
Mon-El.

	He was suspicious of Jeremiah Danvers and voiced those suspicions during the family reunion dinner. Kara and he argued and the she asked him to leave. Jeremiah escorted him out of the party.

questions.text: What game was Winn playing at the bar?
questions.explanation:
Darts.

	He was excited when he hit the board. He and Mon-El were playing at the alien bar. He left shortly after that as he finally tracked down the bomb.

questions.text: Who attacked J'onn inside the DEO?
questions.explanation:
Jeremiah.

	It turned out that Jeremiah was android. He was spying on the DEO for Cadmus, but appeared to still have some of Jeremiah inside him as he tried not to hurt those he knew before Cadmus had captured him.

Train Wreck.

	Cadmus had blown up a bridge that a train was about to cross. She was able to weld one side quickly and then held up the other rail while the train crossed over the bridge. While she was doing that Jeremiah escaped.

questions.text: Which main character, the CEO of CatCo, was absent entirely from the episode?
questions.explanation:
James.

	This was the second straight episode where he didn't appear at all. Starting with the season premiere, James has had much less screen time in season 2 than he did in season 1. When Cat Grant left the company and tapped him to take over for her, his interaction with the other characters seemed to drop off. There were several episodes where he appeared as a costumed crime fighter, but other than that he appeared little in most of the first 14 episodes of the season.
